summary: The SAFE Ride Act of 2025 directs the Secretary of Transportation to establish an electric bike safety program. This includes a grant program for states with e-bike safety programs, focusing on enforcement of safety requirements, public education on helmet use, helmet safety laws, data collection on accidents, support for local law enforcement, and addressing underage riding. The Secretary is also mandated to establish national standards for helmet use for riders under 18 and develop safety curricula.
